credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 13.5 x 9 cm (5 5/16 x 3 9/16 in.)
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: plain weave with complementary wefts and inner warps; binding on the front is 1/3 twill; four dark green, salmon, and yellow wefts; the other colors are bound on the front in 1/3 twill and free floating on the back; the silver is continuous and the silks discontinuous
description: Fragment of a woven textile patterned by a vertically symmetrical pattern of two different offset and dovetailed rows of flowering plants. This fragment isolates on plants. Multi colors on a silver background.
name: Fragment
